channel.title: Dialog
channel.description: I can't figure out NPC Dialog and that tutorial on Page 2 did not help at all... Can someone help?

item.title: Dialog
item.dc:creator: @nissanastra nissanastra
item.description:
@nissanastra wrote:

[quote=“TimmahPwnz, post:2, topic:306578”]Go To NPCHandler.java, Search (Ctrl + F) npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
Then Add

                }
                if (npcs[i].npcType == *Npc ID*) {
                    if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { // How Quick It Says It
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdate = "Thanks Tim For Helping Me!";
                    }[/quote]you should put that like this [code]                    }
                if (npcs[i].npcType == *Npc ID*) {
                    if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { // How Quick It Says It
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdate = "Thanks Tim For Helping Me!";
                    }[/code]
